title: Abronah
html: ABRONAH(A·broʹnah).The site of one of the encampments of the Israelites on their wilderness trek from Egypt. It is listed between Jotbathah and Ezion-geber and has been identified with the oasis ʽAin Defiyeh (ʽEn ʽAvrona), which lies 14.5 km (9 mi) NNE of Ezion-geber.—Nu 33:34, 35.
